name: Pictures at an exhibition (Sarah!)
description:
🎶I was inspired by the suite "Pictures at an exhibition" composed by M.Mussorgsky, and in particular by the following pieces:

  • "Promenade" - Where someone walks around a museum's exhibition.
  • "Gnomus" - Latin for "gnome", this haunting music comments on a little gnome with crooked legs.
  • "The old castle" - A medieval castle.
  • "Bydlo" - the Polish term for "cattle".
  • "Limoges. The Market (The Great News)" - lively music for a busy day at the market of Limoges (France)

Listen on Spotify! https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4F3YNu43MypxnNW3DO0RMv?si=ec45f69340a341f2 

Feedback welcome!
